User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user account within the Thread Weaver application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user (matches Firebase Auth UID).

isDisabled.description: Indicates whether the user account is disabled.

customClaims.description: Custom claims assigned to the user. This is a stringified JSON object to allow for flexibility.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile information. A user can read/update their own profile. An admin can read/update any profile and list all users.

/roles_admin/{userId}.description: Indicates administrative privileges for a user. The *existence* of a document at this path grants admin access. Note that the User schema is referenced here only to have a valid schema. No data from the schema are used.
